archimate:Requirement.name: TS.2.1.3d: d) handling conflicting laws and regulations (e.g. dealing with licence issues) relating to the use of cryptographic solutions in different jurisdictions (e.g. by obtaining advice from the legal function)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
